  • public class CallbacksFromSempre
extends java.lang.Object
    TODO: delete whatever is not required, and move whatever relevant to other classes. Callbacks from the original Sempre code (that doesn't belong in other classes).

      Note: Throughout the execution of Sempre, the only stage in which the weights changed (after their initialization) is between calls to reportWeightsUpdateBegins(Params, Map) and this method.

      • reportNewDerivationCreatedByRule

                                                    java.lang.String cellName,

                                                    boolean pruned)
        Note: anchored cells become floating at level 0 (which is not shown by calling this method).

      • reportAbortingInference

        public static void reportAbortingInference()

      • shouldTheCurrentInferenceBeAborted

        public static boolean shouldTheCurrentInferenceBeAborted()
        Returns:
        true iff sempre should abort the current inference. In that case, only the derivations created so far are considered as candidates.

      • reportWeightsUpdateBegins

        public static void reportWeightsUpdateBegins(edu.stanford.nlp.sempre.Params weights,
                                             java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> gradient)
        Parameters:
        gradient - a map from feature f to the partial derivation of the objective with respect to the weight of f.

      • reportWeightsUpdateEnds

        public static void reportWeightsUpdateEnds(edu.stanford.nlp.sempre.Params weights)
        Note: Throughout the execution of Sempre, the only stage in which the weights changed (after their initialization) is between calls to reportWeightsUpdateBegins(Params, Map) and this method.

      • reportDerivationsPredictedByInference

        public static void reportDerivationsPredictedByInference(edu.stanford.nlp.sempre.Example example,
                                                         java.util.List<edu.stanford.nlp.sempre.Derivation> derivations,
                                                         double[] compatibilities,
                                                         int topDerivationsNumber,
                                                         edu.stanford.nlp.sempre.ParserState sempreParserState)
        This method is called after finishing extracting all features of all derivation of a given inference.
        Parameters:
        derivations - The candidate derivations predicted during inference. Ordered by descending score.
        compatibilities - matches order of 'derivations'.
        topDerivationsNumber - number of derivations receiving the highest score.
